com.samsung.android.sdk.motion

Class Smotion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.Smotion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.samsung.android.sdk.SsdkInterface

    public class Smotion
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.samsung.android.sdk.SsdkInterface
    This class is the entry class that provides access to the Motion package. This class provides methods for initializing the package and for checking whether the Motion features are supported.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • TYPE_PEDOMETER_WITH_UPDOWN_STEP

        public static final int TYPE_PEDOMETER_WITH_UPDOWN_STEP
        Pedometer motion with up/down step status. The up/down status can be recognized and the up/down count calculated only in a device with a pressure sensor.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(android.content.Context context)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException
        Initialize an instance of the Motion package.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException - Thrown if the device was not made by Samsung, doesn't support the feature, or if the SDK version is not matched.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the Context passed is null or wrong.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if initialize() function is already called.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • isFeatureEnabled

        public boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)
        Check if a Motion package feature is available on the device.
        Parameters:
        type - The feature ID. The valid values are:

        TYPE_CALL

        TYPE_PEDOMETER

        TYPE_PEDOMETER_WITH_UPDOWN_STEP

        TYPE_ACTIVITY

        TYPE_ACTIVITY_NOTIFICATION

        Returns:
        true - if the Motion package feature is available on the device.
        false - if the Motion package feature is not available on the device.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the method is called before calling the initialize() method or if the Motion package is not supported on the device.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the feature ID passed is not valid.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getVersionCode

        public int getVersionCode()
        Get the version number of the Motion package.
        Returns:
        The Motion package version number.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getVersionName

        public java.lang.String getVersionName()
        Get the version name of the Motion package.
        Returns:
        The Motion package version name.
        Since:
        1.0.0
